content: Welcome @all! As of today we've got ten folks in this channel registered to participate: @Cooper Thompson @Dennis Ai @Yijie Hong @JT Bennett @Murat Akbal, @Rob Brackett, @Ryan Owens, @Hemalatha Ravishankar, and @Josh Mandel, @Robert Scanlon

We also have two folks registered who don't yet have Zuip accounts:

  • Ke Xu (Carbon Health -- @Murat Akbal perhaps you can ping Ke to sign up here?)
  • Sarah Chandonnet (Ochsner Health -- @Cooper Thompson, perhaps you can ping Sarah to sign up here?)
This kind of async event is new territory for us -- just to see how we're doing, can folks follow Robert's lead and add a response emoji to my message above?

I want to make sure folks know what their "first steps" are this week. Our goal is to meet slot publishers where they are, and through the event work toward consistent support for the Scheduling Links API, identifying issues as we go.
For slot publishers, it might be good to start with a quick status check. I'll create separate topics for each, and @-mention the relevant folks.
